Package com.example.teamalfred.database

Class SqliteClassroomDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.teamalfred.database.SqliteClassroomDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassroomDAO
public class SqliteClassroomDAO extends Object implements ClassroomDAO
SQLite implementation of the ClassroomDAO interface. Provides methods for interacting with the 'classes' table in the database.

      public Classroom getClassroomById(int classId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a specific classroom from the database by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getClassroomById in interface ClassroomDAO
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the classroom to retrieve.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the query is invalid.
